api_list.tool_name: Afterbanks PSD2 payments and bank reader
api_list.api_description: Get a complete list of supported banks, as well as the names of the fields needed to draw a login form similar to the bank's original.

required_parameters.name: countryCode
required_parameters.description: Country code, ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2). For example ES for Spain. If no code is provided, the entire list will be returned.

api_list.tool_name: Afterbanks PSD2 payments and bank reader
api_list.api_description: Returns a list with all the categories retrieved by Afterbanks own categorizer.

required_parameters.name: countryCode
required_parameters.description: Country code, format ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2). For example ES for Spain. If no code is given, the full list is returned.

api_list.api_name: Request list of types of goods
api_list.api_description: Request an entire list of all available "types of goods", which fall into reduced VAT categories in specific EU member states
Use the API's "rate_list" endpoint to obtain standard & reduced VAT rates for all 28 current member states
Using the "validate" endpoint, you may request the API to validate any EU VAT number and obtain information about the company it is assigned to

required_parameters.name: vat_number
required_parameters.description: "vat_number" parameter - append the VAT number you want to validate

api_list.api_description: page source : https://www.investing.com/commodities/grains
This endpoint provides information about the IPO calendar.
page source: https://www.investing.com/commodities/energy

calculate monthly payment. Add all input to the query parameter string.
loanAmount, interestRate, and terms.

relevant APIs: Afterbanks PSD2 payments and bank reader

api_list.api_description:
With this endpoint you can get a collection of all coins.

**API alterations**
- **Get one coin:** https://api.minerstat.com/v2/coins?list=BTC
- **Get list of coins:** https://api.minerstat.com/v2/coins?list=BTC,BCH,BSV
- **Get all coins from one algorithm:** https://api.minerstat.com/v2/coins?algo=SHA-256
- **Get all coins from multiple algorithms:** https://api.minerstat.com/v2/coins?algo=SHA-256,Scrypt,Ethash
Request additional details from the user

query: Find the block height and timestamp of the closest block to the timestamp 1541548802 on the Ethereum blockchain. Moreover, fetch the total value locked (TVL) of the Aave protocol and the TVL of each chain it supports. Lastly, fetch the latest stock price for the CAC 40 index.

api_list.api_description:
Find coins listed on a specific exchange.
This endpoint requires the **ultra** plan or higher.

required_parameters.name: uuid
required_parameters.description: UUID of the exchange you want to request

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description:
Offset. Used for pagination

Default value: 0

optional_parameters.name: search
optional_parameters.description: Filter the results by searching for coin names or symbols.

optional_parameters.name: orderBy
optional_parameters.description:
Index to sort on. Default is 24h volume

Default value: 24hVolume
Allowed values:
24hVolume price numberOfMarkets

optional_parameters.name: orderDirection
optional_parameters.description:
Order in ascending or descending order

Default value: desc
Allowed values:
asc desc

optional_parameters.name: referenceCurrencyUuid
optional_parameters.description:
UUID of reference currency, which rate is used to calculate the volume. Defaults to US Dollar

Default value: yhjMzLPhuIDl

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Limit. Used for pagination

Default value: 50
Size range: 0-100

api_list.api_description:
List of all exchanges currently available on Coinranking, for indexing purposes.
This endpoint requires the **ultra** plan or higher.

Search suggestions are a quick and easy way to find data on coinranking. The endpoint only accepts one parameter; a query. With this query you can find currencies (including fiat), exchanges and markets, by their symbol or name. The response always returns a set of the most prominent coins, exchanges and markets matching your query.

optional_parameters.name: query
optional_parameters.description: Value to search on

optional_parameters.name: referenceCurrencyUuid
optional_parameters.description:
UUID of reference currency, in which the coin prices are calculated. Defaults to US Dollar

Default value: yhjMzLPhuIDl

api_list.api_description: Display the currency conversions historical rates for a particular day

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: Display the single date you wish to get the historical data from. Eg 2010-12-25

required_parameters.name: base
required_parameters.description: The currency code you wish to get the historical rates of. Eg, USD

optional_parameters.name: output
optional_parameters.description: The output of the response. Either JSON or XML

api_list.api_description: Display a currency conversion's historical rates within a given timeframe

required_parameters.name: end_date
required_parameters.description: Display the start date you wish to get the historical data from. Eg 2010-12-29

required_parameters.name: base
required_parameters.description: The currency code you want to get the historical data of. Eg, USD

required_parameters.name: start_date
required_parameters.description: Display the start date you wish to get the historical data from. Eg 2010-12-25

optional_parameters.name: output
optional_parameters.description: The output of the response. Either JSON or XML

api_list.api_description: Gets list of currencies we support

optional_parameters.name: output
optional_parameters.description: The output of the response. Either JSON or XML

query: I want to surprise my family with a cryptocurrency-themed dinner. Can you suggest some popular cryptocurrencies and their market details? Also, provide me with the historical rates of Bitcoin for the past week using the CurrencyAPI.net.

api_list.api_description:
With this endpoint you can get a collection of all coins.

**API alterations**
- **Get one coin:** https://api.minerstat.com/v2/coins?list=BTC
- **Get list of coins:** https://api.minerstat.com/v2/coins?list=BTC,BCH,BSV
- **Get all coins from one algorithm:** https://api.minerstat.com/v2/coins?algo=SHA-256
- **Get all coins from multiple algorithms:** https://api.minerstat.com/v2/coins?algo=SHA-256,Scrypt,Ethash
Returns an outcome. Either heads or tails
Request additional details from the user

query: I'm conducting research on the health benefits of sports and I need specific cricket articles for reference. Can you provide me with articles that discuss the impact of exercise on overall well-being? Additionally, I'm curious to know which chemical elements are associated with exercising, such as their effects on bone marrow. Thank you!

api_list.api_description: Coinranking keeps track of prices on all listed assets. The history endpoint lists prices and their timestamp for the requested time period, useful for making a chart.

required_parameters.description: UUID of the coin you want to request

optional_parameters.name: referenceCurrencyUuid
optional_parameters.description:
UUID of reference currency, in which all the prices are calculated. Defaults to US Dollar

Default value: yhjMzLPhuIDl

optional_parameters.name: timePeriod
optional_parameters.description:
Timeperiod where the change and history are based on

Default value: 24h
Allowed values:
3h 24h 7d 30d 3m 1y 3y 5y

api_list.api_description: test
Blur Image
Get SVG Pattern

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description:
Name of the pattern specified at https://pattern.monster/api
(Default: Random name if not specified)

optional_parameters.name: scale
optional_parameters.description:
0.5 to Max Scale of the pattern specified at https://pattern.monster/api
(Default: Random scale if not specified)

optional_parameters.name: moveLeft
optional_parameters.description: 0 - 100 ( Default: 0 )

optional_parameters.name: angle
optional_parameters.description: 0 - 360 (Default: Random angle if not specified)

optional_parameters.name: strokeJoin
optional_parameters.description:
round or square 
(Default: round)
Valid only for patterns with Stroke Join as specified at https://pattern.monster/api

optional_parameters.name: moveTop
optional_parameters.description: 0 - 100 ( Default: 0 )

optional_parameters.name: colors
optional_parameters.description:
2 to Max Colors of the pattern specified at https://pattern.monster/api
Format: Color1|Color2|Color3|Color4|Color5
At least, two colors are required if specified
(Default: Random colors if not specified)
Accepted color values: 
CSS colors ( eg. aqua, red )
RGB or RGBA colors ( eg. rgb(59,130,246), rgba(234,179,8,0.7) )
HSL or HSLA colors ( eg. hsl(300, 76%, 72%), hsla(147,50%,47%,0.5) )
HEX colors without the hash symbol ( eg. E11D48, 2563eb )

optional_parameters.name: spacing
optional_parameters.description:
Horizontal Spacing | Vertical Spacing
(Default: 0|0)
Max Spacing of the pattern specified at https://pattern.monster/api
Valid only for patterns with Max Spacing other than 0|0

optional_parameters.name: stroke
optional_parameters.description:
0.5 to Max Stroke of the pattern specified at https://pattern.monster/api
(Default: Random stroke if not specified)
Valid only for patterns with Mode as Stroke

api_list.api_description: Request additional details from the user

Can you blur the image of her favorite actress from the URL 'https://example.com/actress.jpg'? Additionally, I need a random SVG pattern with the name 'dots-3' and a scale of 1.5 for decorating the party venue.

api_list.api_description: Returns list of live and upcoming games for a given sport, and optionally recently completed games. Live and completed games will contain scores. **Currently in beta** and only available for selected sports. For more info, see the [list of available sports](https://the-odds-api.com/sports-odds-data/sports-apis.html)

required_parameters.name: sport
required_parameters.description: sport key for which to return games and odds

optional_parameters.name: daysFrom
optional_parameters.description: The number of days in the past from which to return completed games. Valid values are integers from `1` to `3`. If this field is missing, only live and upcoming games are returned.

api_list.api_description: Returns a list of available sports and tournaments. Use the `sports_key` in requests for /odds and /scores endpoints.

optional_parameters.name: all
optional_parameters.description: When excluded, only recently updated (in-season) sports appear. Include this paramter to see all available sports

api_list.api_description: Returns list of live and upcoming games for a given sport, showing bookmaker odds for the specified region and markets. Set the `sport` to a `sport_key` from the /sports endpoint. Alternatively if `sport=upcoming`, it will return a list of the next 8 upcoming games across all sports, as well as any live games. For more info, see [list of available sports](https://the-odds-api.com/sports-odds-data/sports-apis.html) and [list of available bookmakers](https://the-odds-api.com/sports-odds-data/bookmaker-apis.html).

required_parameters.name: sport
required_parameters.description: sport key for which to return games and odds

required_parameters.name: regions
required_parameters.description: Determines which bookmakers appear in the response. Can be a comma delimited list of regions. Each region will count as 1 request against the usage quota for each market. Most use cases will only need to specify one region. For a list of bookmakers by region, see https://the-odds-api.com/sports-odds-data/bookmaker-apis.html

optional_parameters.name: oddsFormat
optional_parameters.description: Format of returned odds.

optional_parameters.name: markets
optional_parameters.description: The odds market to return. Can be a comma delimited list of odds markets. Defaults to h2h (head to head / moneyline). Outrights only avaialable for select sports. Note each market counts as 1 request against the usage quota.

optional_parameters.name: dateFormat
optional_parameters.description: Format of returned timestamps. Can be iso (ISO8601) or unix timestamp (seconds since epoch)

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the team

api_list.api_description:
Get the details for the containing populated place (e.g., its county or other administrative division), including location coordinates, population, and elevation above sea-level  (if available). 

Currently, this data is highly dependent on whether the Wikidata **locatedIn** relation is properly defined. If you see an issue, please propose a change to the corresponding Wikidata entry.
Get places near the given location, filtering by optional criteria.

required_parameters.name: radius
required_parameters.description: The location radius within which to find places

required_parameters.name: locationid
required_parameters.description: Only cities near this location. Latitude/longitude in ISO-6709 format: ±DD.DDDD±DDD.DDDD

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The zero-ary offset into the results

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of results to retrieve

optional_parameters.name: languageCode
optional_parameters.description: Display results in this language

optional_parameters.name: timeZoneIds
optional_parameters.description: Only places in these time-zones

optional_parameters.name: asciiMode
optional_parameters.description: Display results using ASCII characters

optional_parameters.name: includeDeleted
optional_parameters.description: Whether to include any places marked deleted: ALL | SINCE_YESTERDAY | SINCE_LAST_WEEK | NONE

optional_parameters.name: maxPopulation
optional_parameters.description: Only places having no more than this population

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: How to sort the results. Format: ±SORT_FIELD,±SORT_FIELD where SORT_FIELD = countryCode | elevation | name | population

optional_parameters.name: hateoasMode
optional_parameters.description: Include HATEOAS-style links in results

optional_parameters.name: excludedCountryIds
optional_parameters.description: Only places NOT in these countries (comma-delimited country codes or WikiData ids)

optional_parameters.name: namePrefixDefaultLangResults
optional_parameters.description: When name-prefix matching, whether or not to match on names in the default language if a non-default language is requested

optional_parameters.name: countryIds
optional_parameters.description: Only places in these countries (comma-delimited country codes or WikiData ids)

optional_parameters.name: distanceUnit
optional_parameters.description: The unit of distance to use: MI | KM

optional_parameters.name: namePrefix
optional_parameters.description: Only places whose names start with this prefix. If languageCode is set, the prefix will be matched on the name as it appears in that language.

optional_parameters.name: types
optional_parameters.description: Only places for these types (comma-delimited): ADM2 | CITY | ISLAND

optional_parameters.name: minPopulation
optional_parameters.description: Only places having at least this population

api_list.api_description: Find administrative divisions, filtering by optional criteria. If no criteria are set, you will get back all known divisions with a population of at least 1000

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: How to sort the results. Format: ±SORT_FIELD,±SORT_FIELD where SORT_FIELD = countryCode | elevation | name | population

optional_parameters.name: timeZoneIds

optional_parameters.name: distanceUnit
optional_parameters.description: The unit of distance to use: MI | KM

optional_parameters.name: offset

optional_parameters.name: location
optional_parameters.description: Only divisions near this location. Latitude/longitude in ISO-6709 format: ±DD.DDDD±DDD.DDDD

optional_parameters.name: namePrefix
optional_parameters.description: Only divisions whose names start with this prefix. If languageCode is set, the prefix will be matched on the name as it appears in that language.

optional_parameters.name: maxPopulation
optional_parameters.description: Only divisions having no more than this population

optional_parameters.name: countryIds
optional_parameters.description: Only divisions in these countries (comma-delimited country codes or WikiData ids)

optional_parameters.name: asciiMode
optional_parameters.description: Display results using ASCII characters

optional_parameters.name: namePrefixDefaultLangResults
optional_parameters.description: When name-prefix matching, whether or not to match on names in the default language if a non-default language is requested

optional_parameters.name: minPopulation
optional_parameters.description: Only divisions having at least this population

api_list.api_description: These global statistics tell about the data available on coinranking.

optional_parameters.name: referenceCurrencyUuid
optional_parameters.description:
UUID of reference currency, in which all the prices are calculated. Defaults to US Dollar

Default value: yhjMzLPhuIDl

api_list.api_description:
Get OHLC (Open High Low Close) data for the coin throughout time.
This endpoint requires the **ultra** plan or higher.

**Beta**
The OHLC endpoint is currently in beta. This means we might make some changes that could be considered breaking for your application, and we expect to have downtime every now and then while we are still in beta.

required_parameters.name: uuid
required_parameters.description: UUID of the coin you want to request. UUIDs of coins can be found using the Get coins endpoint or by checking the URL on coinranking.com, e.g. https://coinranking.com/coin/Qwsogvtv82FCd+bitcoin-btc is the URL for Bitcoin, and the part before the + (Qwsogvtv82FCd) is the UUID.

optional_parameters.name: referenceCurrencyUuid
optional_parameters.description:
UUID of reference currency, in which all the prices are calculated. Defaults to US Dollar.

Default value: yhjMzLPhuIDl

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Limit the amount of time periods for which the OHLC data is retrieved. For example, when interval=hour and limit is 10, data will be returned for the last 10 hours.

Default value: 50
Size range: 0-100

optional_parameters.name: interval
optional_parameters.description:
The interval determines the time period over which each OHLC item is determined.

Default value: day
Allowed values:
minute 5minutes hour 8hours day week month

api_list.api_description:
Find markets on a specific exchange.
This endpoint requires the **ultra** plan or higher.

required_parameters.name: uuid
required_parameters.description: UUID of the exchange you want to request markets for

optional_parameters.name: referenceCurrencyUuid
optional_parameters.description:
UUID of reference currency, which rate is used to calculate the volume. Defaults to US Dollar

Default value: yhjMzLPhuIDl

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description:
Offset. Used for pagination

Default value: 0

optional_parameters.name: orderBy
optional_parameters.description:
Index to sort on. Default is 24h volume.

Default value: 24hVolume
Allowed values:
24hVolume price

optional_parameters.name: search
optional_parameters.description: Value to search for within results, e.g. exchange names, currency names, or currency symbols

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Limit. Used for pagination

Default value: 50
Size range: 0-100

optional_parameters.name: orderDirection
optional_parameters.description:
Order in ascending or descending order

Default value: desc
Allowed values:
desc asc

query: I need some inspiration for my art project. Can you find unique and creative designs related to cats on Redbubble? Specifically, designs related to orange cats. It would be great if you could provide me with the title, price, image, and tags of the items. Additionally, I'm interested in exploring products from the brand '4th-heart' on iHerb. Please fetch the product details, including the title, price, link, rating, and image. Thank you!
